title: @WAARGHbobo, what was the Vlad taunt that got edited out?
body:
I appreciate that you wrote one or two after all the requests, but unfortunately they didn't make the cut. Can us fans at least know what they were?

After all Darkin and Noxus are the two factions Vlad is supposed to be related to, and as it is he has no interactions with both. A lot of fans would really appreciate having some canon in place.

replies.body: (Pssst - if it didn't get published, then it's not canon...) ;-)

_give_

(that said I love Bobo's writing and would love to read them at the very least as representatation of his judgment regarding Vladimir's connection to the Darkin)
I don't believe I ever saw the script before the final recording sessions took place, so I'd also be interested to see anything that was cut before that :-)

I've never seen such a mocking smile.

That's pure evil.

It's a bit sad that people waited and asked in the most civil, polite ways possible for some characterisation with this VGU, starting as early as February, and got a middle finger from Riot again. I know it's not as bad as it seems, but all the other fans who've been longing for this don't :(
We are a lot of Vladimir fans out there, who are starving due to lack of canon lore. We'll take anything we can get, even if it didn't end up making the cut.

Even his reanimation of Sion is possibly retconned. He's had nothing other than a Journal of Justice response to a fan question for how many years, now?

It's past starving at this point.
I cut it early I believe.   Something about not glimmering enough.     --I decided using "twilight" to mock someone was to esoteric.

> [{quoted}](name=WAAARGHbobo,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=q02zhd9p,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2018-06-12T23:32:22.912+0000)
>
> I cut it early I believe.   Something about not glimmering enough.     --I decided using "twilight" to mock someone was to esoteric.

So I hope this isn’t too salty, but two thoughts immediately hit me:

1. Given the sort of rich space Vlad occupies as our bloodmage, and his not really being a run-of-the-mill vampire (a vampire but not vampire, if you would) I am surprised something else wasn’t on the list. 

Please don’t take this as a shot, as I really love the writing you did for both Jhin and Kled - between the lines themselves and Quinton Flynn’s delivery, Jhin is a masterpiece. Even “HOW LOVELY” is a superb line, despite being all of two words. So I guess it just kinda bums me out that he wasn’t going to get a line that gives some small amount of life to him.

2. I understand there can be any number of reasons why it got cut, but I think it’s fair to ask why it wasn’t given a little more weight? There are definitely champions he isn’t going to encounter much that he has lines for, but Vlad is both a popular champion in top and mid lane at many levels of play, and he’s a woefully underdeveloped character and has been for many years now. I respect that a lot of his lines make sense - having one for someone like Anivia, a mid laner he may not get close to much, but because she’s a thing he hates (gods), he’s there. But over Vlad? And for Mundo? I get thst he’s a top laner, but Vlad is probably of similar pick rate and even if not related in existing lore, he’s still more related to Aatrox if only by blood (rimshot, I know).

Anyway, thanks for letting us know. I’d love to ask some questions about Aatrox’s lines if you ever take questions.

Of all the Vladimir source material you can take and expand on to create a highly relevant and intelligent bit of lore you go for this one?

Shaking my head family.

(Besides Twilight was 10 years ago and is quite forgotten)

That said thank you for sharing, I had a chuckle.
Agreed. After seeing that a line or two might be there for Aatrox to speak to Vlad, I was pretty excited. I would love to know what he was going to say.

Why bother setting the Varus comic up to say hemomancy has a connection to the Darkin if not to display it at all when they have the chances? It wouldn't have been hard to have Aatrox say like 'you use our magic well' or something, literally any hint to the lore they might be working on with him, like the other champions(Zoe, Anivia, Morgana (who are also not top laners btw)) they did this for - but a Twilight joke is all they've got? That's not even to mention that nearly a quarter of Vladimir games are played top, much less than any of those three.

I'm really, really disappointed with this, especially on the back of there being no taunt for him from Swain.
